description: Try our easy to follow Lentil, Cheese & Walnut Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Halal,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Vegetarian,Low sugar,Low fat,Summer
name: Lentil, Cheese & Walnut Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking tray with paper.
Place half of the cottage cheese into a fine sieve over a bowl and leave to drain.

Place half the lentils in a food processor with 1 egg and process until smooth. Transfer to a large bowl. Add remaining lentils, cottage cheese, spring onion, carrot, chilli and breadcrumbs. Season with salt and pepper. Stir well to combine. Form into 8 patties and place on a plate.
Place flour into a shallow bowl. Whisk remaining egg in a separate shallow bowl with 1 tbs cold water. Combine extra breadcrumbs and walnuts in a separate bowl.

Lightly coat each fritter in the flour, egg wash and finish with breadcrumbs. Place onto prepared tray. Spray with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes. Turn over and cook for a further 10 minutes or until golden. Serve salad greens, topped with fritters and salsa.
